_meanings:

praise ({#pUjA#}); ({%b%}) separation; ({%c%})
resolution, ascertainment, certainty;
and translated by ‘surely,’ 
‘certainly,’ ‘yes,’ ‘well’; ({%d%}) rejecting; ({%e%})
sending; ({%f%}) deviation from 
custom, impropriety; {#tvamaha grAmaM gacCa#},
{#tvamaha raTetAraRyaM gacCa#} <ls>Sk.</ls>; {#svayamaha#} 
{#raTena yAti 3 upADyAyaM padAtiM gamayati#} <ls>Sk.</ls>
